00030 #if defined( DEBUG_USB_API )
00031 #define DEBUG_TRACE_ABORT( x )                                  \
00032 {                                                               \
00033   if ( x == USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED )                             \
00034   {  DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nEP cb(), EP stalled" );           } \
00035   else if ( x == USB_STATUS_EP_ABORTED )                        \
00036   {  DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nEP cb(), EP aborted" );           } \
00037   else if ( x == USB_STATUS_DEVICE_UNCONFIGURED )               \
00038   {  DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nEP cb(), device unconfigured" );  } \
00039   else if ( x == USB_STATUS_DEVICE_SUSPENDED )                  \
00040   {  DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nEP cb(), device suspended" );     } \
00041   else /* ( x == USB_STATUS_DEVICE_RESET ) */                   \
00042   {  DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nEP cb(), device reset" );         } \
00043 }

00062 __STATIC_INLINE void USBD_ActivateAllEps( bool forceIdle )
00063 {
00064   int i;
00065 
00066   for ( i = 1; i <= NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00067   {
00068     USBDHAL_ActivateEp( &dev->ep[ i ], forceIdle );
00069   }
00070 }
00071 
00072 __STATIC_INLINE void USBD_ArmEp( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00073 {
00074   if ( ep->num == 0 )
00075   {
00076     USBD_ArmEp0( ep );
00077   }
00078   else
00079   {
00080     USBD_ArmEpN( ep );
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 __STATIC_INLINE void USBD_ArmEp0( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00085 {
00086   if ( ep->in )
00087   {
00088     if ( ep->remaining == 0 )       /* Zero Length Packet? */
00089     {
00090       ep->zlp = 1;
00091     }
00092 
00093     USBDHAL_SetEp0InDmaPtr( ep->buf );
00094     USBDHAL_StartEp0In( EFM32_MIN( ep->remaining, ep->packetSize ),
00095                         dev->ep0MpsCode );
00096   }
00097   else
00098   {
00099     USBDHAL_SetEp0OutDmaPtr( ep->buf );
00100     USBDHAL_StartEp0Out( ep->packetSize, dev->ep0MpsCode );
00101   }
00102 }
00103 
00104 __STATIC_INLINE void USBD_ArmEpN( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00105 {
00106   if ( ep->in )
00107   {
00108     USBDHAL_StartEpIn( ep );
00109   }
00110   else
00111   {
00112     USBDHAL_StartEpOut( ep );
00113   }
00114 }
00115 
00116 __STATIC_INLINE void USBD_DeactivateAllEps( USB_Status_TypeDef reason )
00117 {
00118   int i;
00119   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00120 
00121   for ( i = 1; i <= NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00122   {
00123     ep = &dev->ep[ i ];
00124 
00125     if ( ep->state == D_EP_IDLE )
00126     {
00127       USBDHAL_DeactivateEp( ep );
00128     }
00129   }
00130 
00131   USBDHAL_AbortAllTransfers( reason );
00132 }
00133 
00134 __STATIC_INLINE USBD_Ep_TypeDef *USBD_GetEpFromAddr( uint8_t epAddr )
00135 {
00136   int epIndex;
00137   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep = NULL;
00138 
00139   if ( epAddr & USB_SETUP_DIR_MASK )
00140   {
00141     epIndex = dev->inEpAddr2EpIndex[ epAddr & USB_EPNUM_MASK ];
00142   }
00143   else
00144   {
00145     epIndex = dev->outEpAddr2EpIndex[ epAddr & USB_EPNUM_MASK ];
00146   }
00147 
00148   if ( epIndex )
00149   {
00150     ep = &dev->ep[ epIndex ];
00151   }
00152   else if ( ( epAddr & USB_EPNUM_MASK ) == 0 )
00153   {
00154     ep = &dev->ep[ 0 ];
00155   }
00156 
00157   return ep;
00158 }
00159 
00160 __STATIC_INLINE void USBD_ReArmEp0( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00161 {
00162   if ( ep->in )
00163   {
00164     USBDHAL_StartEp0In( EFM32_MIN( ep->remaining, ep->packetSize ),
00165                         dev->ep0MpsCode );
00166   }
00167   else
00168   {
00169     USBDHAL_StartEp0Out( ep->packetSize, dev->ep0MpsCode );
00170   }
00171 }
00172 
00173 __STATIC_INLINE void USBD_AbortEp( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00174 {
00175   if ( ep->state == D_EP_IDLE )
00176   {
00177     return;
00178   }
00179 
00180   if ( ep->in )
00181   {
00182     USBDHAL_AbortEpIn( ep );
00183   }
00184   else
00185   {
00186     USBDHAL_AbortEpOut( ep );
00187   }
00188 }
